src:
Republiški stanovanjski sklad v Kočevju kupil 76 stanovanj
05 Nov 2019, 15:30 by STA
Kočevje - Stanovanjski sklad RS je danes od GH Holdinga kupil 76 stanovanj v Kočevju, ki jih bo oddajal prek javnega razpisa po stroškovni najemnini. Za stanovanja bo odštel 7,1 milijona evrov, so danes sporočili iz sklada.
"Stanovanjski sklad RS se odziva na hiter gospodarski razvoj občine Kočevje, kjer je potreba po najemu stanovanj čedalje večja. Z današnjim nakupom bomo pridobili 76 javnih najemnih stanovanj, ki jih bomo lahko že v letu 2021 oddajali prek javnega razpisa po stroškovni najemnini mladim družinam, družinam in ostalim ciljnim skupinam prebivalstva," je povedal direktor sklada Črtomir Remec.
Stanovanjski sklad bo 76 stanovanj v Kočevju kupil prek javnega poziva za nakup stanovanj in zemljišč za izgradnjo stanovanj od prodajalca iz skupine GH Holding, ki jo vodi direktor Blaž Miklavčič.
Sklad stanovanja, ki so v dveh objektih skupne površine okoli 4200 kvadratnih metrov, kupuje s pripadajočimi 29 parkirnimi mesti v garaži objekta, 32 parkirnimi mesti na nivoju terena in 49 samostojnimi garažami na nivoju terena. Skupna pogodbena vrednost znaša 6,45 milijona evrov brez davka oz. 7,06 milijona evrov z DDV.
text:
Republic housing fund in Kočevje bought 76 flats
05 Nov 2019, 15:30 by STA
Kočevje - The Housing Fund of the Republic of Slovenia has today purchased 76 flats in Kočevje from GH Holding, which will be leased through a public tender at cost price. It will deduct 7.1 million euros for apartments, the fund said today.
"The Housing Fund of the Republic of Slovenia is responding to the rapid economic development of the municipality of Kočevje, where the need for renting apartments is increasing. With today's purchase, we will acquire 76 public rented apartments, which we will be able to rent in 2021 through a public tender for cost-effective rent to young families, families and other target population groups, "said Črtomir Remec, director of the fund.
The Housing Fund will buy 76 flats in Kočevje through a public call for the purchase of flats and land for the construction of flats from a seller from the GH Holding group led by Director Blaž Miklavčič.
The apartment fund, which is in two buildings with a total area of about 4,200 square meters, is being purchased with the corresponding 29 parking spaces in the facility's garage, 32 parking spaces at ground level and 49 detached garages at ground level. The total contract value amounts to EUR 6.45 million excluding tax or tax. EUR 7.06 million including VAT.
